easy.question: Why are you interested in this position?
What are your strengths and weaknesses?
Where do you see yourself in five years?

medium.question: Describe a time when you had to work with a difficult team member.
How do you handle pressure or stressful situations?
Tell me about a time you failed and what you learned from it.
How do you prioritize your work when you have multiple deadlines?

hard.question: Describe a situation where you had to convince others to see things your way.
Tell me about a time when you had to make an unpopular decision.
How would you handle a situation where you disagree with your manager's decision?
Describe a time when you went above and beyond for a project or customer.
